titleStmt.title: A high and heavenly eccho. By a faithful minister of the Gospel.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Rothwell, at the Fountain and Bear in Cheapside,

notesStmt.note: In two parts: 'Explanatory verses, conteining, as the occasion of, so cautions for the understanding the following Scripture-ecchoes' and 'The Eccho'.
Verse - "Nigh to ones house an answering eccho is;".
Signed at end: By a faithful minister of the Gospel.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
